document.full_text: arizona's highest court on wednesday lifted the hold it placed on the execution of a man condemned for the 1984 rape and murder of a 13-year-old girl, clearing the way for him to be put to death.
document.title: arizona supreme court lifts execution hold
lines_and_colors: arizona's highest court on wednesday lifted the hold it placed on the execution of a man condemned for the 1984 rape and murder of a 13-year-old girl, clearing the way for him to be put to death.
